text: Tini'i asamana o yamina chaya dine tairi karechena, tamra arasa chila panira upare, tini tomaderake pariksa karate cana ye, tomadera madhye ke sabaceye bhala kaja kare. Ara yadi apani taderake balena ye, "niscaya tomaderake mrtyura pare jibita othano habe, takhana kapherera abasya bale eta to spasta yadu
